title: How to allocate 50,000 $POLS?
body:
The MANTRA DAO Foundation is allocating 50,000 $POLS for the initial launch of the Sherpa Community "soft governance". Please select the option you believe will be most beneficial to the Sherpa Community. 

The voting will begin on Nov 11, 2020, and last for a week until Nov 18, 2020. 


🕉🕉🕉,
The Council
choices: Airdrop $POLS to $OM stakers - Exact mechanism TBD
Convert $POLS to $OM on secondary market & HODL $OM
HODL $POLS for distribution at a later date
author: 0xB6B6f1c64BEB51a8bc71eD3F21357C46515F8479
